text:
Hi all !
How I can to add the form by id on the blog pageÂ  ?
This is my cod .
 `{% blog_subscribe "blog_subscribe" title='Get new articles in your inbox', select_blog='default', response_message='Thanks for Subscribing!', label='Enter your email address' %}` 
I want to add form by id .

The blog subscribe tag will always get the blog subscription form for the blog you're currently on.

you can use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#form|{% form  %}> tag to get a specific form if you need something different.
